text: Yu Hasegawa (born 5 June 1987) is a former Japanese football player. ==Club statistics== Updated to 1 March 2019.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 114 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 191 out of 289) Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2006 Kashiwa Reysol J2 League 1 0 - - 1 0 FC Gifu JRL (Tokai) 0 0 0 0 - 0 0 2007 Kashiwa Reysol J1 League 0 0 - 0 0 0 0 Avispa Fukuoka J2 League 9 0 0 0 - 9 0 2008 Montedio Yamagata 39 13 2 0 - 41 13 2009 J1 League 31 10 1 0 5 0 37 10 2010 25 1 2 1 4 0 31 2 2011 23 2 2 2 2 0 27 4 2012 Omiya Ardija 30 5 3 1 5 1 38 7 2013 27 4 3 0 6 1 36 5 2014 17 2 4 2 6 0 27 4 2015 Tokushima Vortis J2 League 36 3 4 3 - 40 6 2016 9 1 - - 9 1 Shimizu S-Pulse 6 0 3 1 - 9 1 2017 J1 League 16 2 3 3 3 0 22 5 2018 9 0 1 0 4 2 14 2 Career total Career total Career total 278 43 28 13 35 4 341 62 ==References== ==Other websites== *Montedio Yamagata Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Yamanashi Prefecture
